header.introduction: Hi! How nice to have you here! my name is Rafael Godoy and I have a degree in Front-End Web Development from the technology school Trybe, where I am completing the training in Back-End Web Development. Here you will get to know a little of my trajectory and see where my curious nature has taken me so far. You will also be able to see under what values I built my history and how I see the world. Come on?

main.p: My previous jobs and my qualifications

second.activities: Opening of my first restaurant in the city of São Carlos-sp

third.activities: Opening of my second restaurant in the city of Americana-sp

next.activities: What about we built this card together?

second.activities: Bachelor of Science in Chemistry with emphasis in Food Chemistry

third.activities: Beginning of training as a Full-Stack Developer person

fourth.activities: Completion of the fundamentals module - Linux | Git - GitHub | HTML5 | CSS3 | Web Storage | Flexbox | Mobile First | ES6 | Jest

fifth.activities: Trained Front-End developer person - React | React Router | RTL | Redux | context API | agile methodologies

personalValues.whatIBelive: The science, education and collaboration are fundamental pillars in building a better and fairer society and that excellence, in practice, is achieved in the habit of seeking excellence.

science.back: The search for the unknown, innovation and evolution make science the perfect tool to improve people's lives.

education.back: Education democratizes knowledge. It has the ability to change the way people see the world. - And how they question it.

collaboration.back: Diversity is what makes us unique, but the only way to see the world is not to see it. Valuing others is respecting yourself.
